review: I cut the cord 9 years ago, and I recently said good bye to my tivo and have to admit, the very inexpensive firestick with hulu and some crossy road has helped the grieving. It's not perfect, it does chug on occasion, but for the price and convenience, I couldn't be more pleased. My children, who have a bit of an addiction to the amazing world of gum ball, would revolt if I were to give it up!
author: Brian Polk

review: Does NOT work with HULU.  Netflix, Amazon Prime, all other apps are fine.  Hulu will lag and ultimately freeze after a few minutes.  Not a bandwidth issue, not a wireless channel issue.  Google is filled with posts about people with this same problem, no response from Amazon.  I got my Fire Stick as a gift.  I will be returning it for a Roku.
author: Max
